text: In the unicellular fission yeast S . pombe , the USP46 homolog Ubp9 regulates endocytosis , actin dynamics and cell polarity ( Kouranti et al . , 2010 ) . Much like its counterparts in other systems , Ubp9 is only catalytically active when bound to two WDR proteins , Bun107 , which is homologous to WDR48 , and Bun62 , which is homologous to WDR20 . Interestingly , Ubp9 stability and subcellular localization can be regulated by interaction with the WDR proteins . Kouranti et al . ( 2010 ) .
